name: SplFileObject.fgetcsv
purpose: Gets line from file and parse as CSV fields

return.description:
Returns an indexed array containing the fields read, or FALSE on error.A blank line in a CSV file will be returned as an array
    comprising a single NULL field unless using SplFileObject::SKIP_EMPTY | SplFileObject::DROP_NEW_LINE, 
    in which case empty lines are skipped.
